name: Color Lab (itch) (Anomaly Games)
description:
Color Lab is a casual shooter game in which you combine 2 or more of the same color.

Instructions PC

Use your mouse to point at whatever color you want to match.

Click to shoot.

Mobile

Tap to shoot.

Gamemodes Classic

Complete as many levels as possible. Be aware that the colors will come down. they will go slow but will go faster at every level. If the colors are too close to your base, it's game over.

Action

Like the classic mode, but the bar is halfway and will decrease slowly, then will be faster at every level. If the colors are too close to you, or if the bar is empty, it's game over.

Minefield

UNLOCKS AT CLASSIC MODE, LEVEL 20.

Like the classic mode, except there are mines. If you explode any of them, it's game over.

Credits

Programming - Anomaly

Design - Anomaly

Animation - Anomaly

Music - Creatune
